data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Chittoor, Andhra Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chittoor, Andhra Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 4,174,100 people living in Chittoor, Andhra Pradesh, India. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Chittoor, Andhra Pradesh, India who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Chittoor, Andhra Pradesh, India. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Tiruvalluvar people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Tiruvalluvar people know you.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Chittoor, Andhra Pradesh, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Chittoor with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 45,915 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

location.name: Chittoor
